text:
Are you ready to practise some more
common daily expressions?
Hello and welcome everyone, this is Minoo at Anglo-Link.

This is the third lesson in our series 'Listening and Speaking Practice'. 
If you haven't watched the first two lessons,
you can watch them by clicking here.

Remember that you should first listen and
write down all the

sentences, like a dictation, before you
start to repeat them.

And when you repeat them, make sure
you don't read your notes.
So, when you're ready we can begin!
